description: Programmatically generate, load, modify, and convert Excel .xlsx spreadsheets in your Java applications. Document Solutions for Excel (DsExcel, previously GcExcel) is a cross-platform high-speed, small-footprint spreadsheet API library that requires no dependencies on Excel. The powerful calculation engine supports 450+ Excel Functions and custom functions to perform complex calculations. DsExcel is 2x+ faster and uses less memory than Apache POI and allows you to save to XLSX, PDF, HTML, CSV, JSON and Images. Deploy your applications to the cloud, Windows, Mac, or Linux. If you'd like to remove the trial watermark and other trial limitations, please email us.sales@mescius.com to request your 30-day evaluation key.
licenses: End-User License Agreements For MESCIUS Software
